oonama wagakimakin oonama wagakimak: • ruju ho • apage web adawiya sambandhawa ho bhawitha kirima sambandhawa oonama parishilakayekuta wakra ho ahithakara alabhayak ho hani ho bhawitha kirima, bhawitha kirimata nohakiwima ho apage web adawiya bhawitha kirima pilibanda prathipala, eyata sambandha oonama web adawi saha eyata athulath karana lada oonama drawyayak athuluwa, kisidu wagakimakin thorawa: • aadayam ho aadayam ahimi wima; • wyapara ahimi wima; • labha ho giwisum ahimi wima; • apekshitha ithurum ahimi wima; • daththa nathiwima; • hondahitha ahimi wima; • nasthikara kalamanakaranaya ho karyala kalaya; saha kisiyam aakarayaka wenath paduwa ho haniya sandaha, konthraththuwa ho wenath aakarayakin wancha sahagatha lesa (ho wanchawa athuluwa) wisin sidu karanu labuwada, mema thathwayan ahimi ho hani sandaha himikam pama walakwima nokere ihatha sandahan karana lada oonama wargikaranayakin thorawa apa wisin iwath nokala ruju mulya paduwa sandaha obe sparshaniya depala ho wenath himikam himikam.

rajya nowana sanwidhana adhyapanaya labadena muwawen ratata wina karana kisidu kriyawakata ida nodana bawath, ee pilibanda dadi wimasillen sitina bawath agamathi di.mu. jayarathna mahatha parlimenthuwedi eeye (23) prakasha kaleya.yam sanwidhanayak thama wishaya pathayata paribahirawa ho pawathna nithiyata patahaniwa kriya karana bawata thorathuru anawaranaya wuwahoth lankawe walangu nithiprakarawa katayuthu karawa bawada agamathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.sthawara niyoga 23(2) yatathe wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha rajya nowana sanwidhanawala katayuthu pilibandawa buddhi ansha sewa mangin wartha sakas kara thibe dayi kala wimasimata pilithuru demin eese ki agamathiwaraya yam rajya nowana sanwidhanayak thama prakashitha wishaya pathayen baharawa nithi ullanghanaya karamin jathika aarakshawata balapamak ho tharjanaya wana aakarayata katayuthu kirima nithiyata patahani kriyawak lesa rajaya salakana bawada kiya.mema sanwidhana pawathwagena yama sandaha panawa athi 1980 anka 31 swechcha samaja sewa sanwidhana (liyapadinchi kirima ha adhikshanaya kirima) panatha ha 1998 anka 8 darana sashodhana panath ketumpatha manginda ee yatathe athi prakashitha regulasi chakralekha upades mala mema sanwidhanawalata balapana nitha lesa handunwana bawada kiya.rajaya buddhi sewawa me pilibandawa sakas kala warthawa sakasimedi anekuth buddhi ansha wartha da salakillata gena athi bawa ki agamathiwaraya buddhi ansha siya nigamana sandaha yoda gath minum dandu lesa sama rajya nowana sanwidhanayakma shri lankawe pawathna nithi anuwa liyapadinchi kala yuthu athara, owun ehidi thama kriyakarakam prakasha kala yuthuya.elesa owun prakashitha kriyakarakamwalin obbata yamin ho rate pawathna nithiyata paribahirawa katayuthu karanne nam buddhi ansha me sanwidhana pilibandawa wimasillen sitina bawath, mema sanwidhana liyapadinchi kalada, prakashitha kriyakarakam karanawada, nithiyata paribahirawa nithiya ullanghanaya karamin katayuthu karanawada yanna soya balana bawada kiya.rajya aarakshawata balapamak yanu ranil wikramasinha mahatha nagu prashanyakata pilithuru dun agamathiwaraya, ratakata kramopayika washayen itha wadagath thorathuru deshiya ho wideshiya sathuru parshawayan ho thrasthawadin athata pathwima ho nathiwima mangin ratata, ratehi swairithwata athiwana haniya mangin ratehi pawathmata balapama memangin nirupanaya karana bawada kiweya.rajya nowana sanwidhana liyapadinchi kirimata ha eewa niyamanaya kirimata awashya piyawara rajaya gena thibena bawa ki agamathiwaraya rata winasha karana kumanthrana pilibanda buddhi ansha awadhiyen sitina bawath penwa dunneya.yuddhayak awasanwi thibena mohothaka rate ananyathawaya ha bhaumika akhandathawaya raka ganima wenuwen buddhi anshaya nirathnara awadhiyen sitina bawada di.mu. jayarathna mahatha wadiduratath kiweya.
